definition: beyond one's reach or power (to do sth)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
the will is there, but not the strength (idiom)/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
pinyin: xin1 you3 yu2 er2 li4 bu4 zu2

definition: to rely on sb for support
to struggle to cope (with a situation)/to be at one's wits' end
It's hard to clap with only one hand./It takes two to tango/It's difficult to achieve anything without support.
to give no cause for anxiety/nothing to worry about
to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
to strive/to make an effort/to exert oneself
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
